name: Pepe Community
description: Pepe Community stands out as a trusted and creative force in Web3 ecosystems, rooted in fairness and resilience. Representing the DNA: 0xBE, it fosters authenticity, pride, and collaboration, redefining meme culture, with a positive and enduring impact. This is an original and community driven PEPE meme project. It was released on Ethereum, Aug 24, 2023 and the random members turned founders continue to build to this day.
